build_command: chmod +x scripts/generate-firebase-config.sh && ./scripts/generate-firebase-config.sh && flutter build web --release --dart-define=CLERK_PUBLISHABLE_KEY=$CLERK_PUBLISHABLE_KEY --dart-define=API_BASE_URL=$API_BASE_URL --dart-define=FIREBASE_VAPID_KEY=$FIREBASE_VAPID_KEY && cp web/firebase-config.js build/web/
